name: Bendy and the Secret Henry
description:
I present to you a fan game with the name of the game: Bendy and the Secret Henry (Alpha version) Storyline (There is one animator his name is Henry, and he has his secrets in Joey Drew Studios, and he hid them, and he hid them so much that he forgot , and you have to go and look for your secrets).

Features of the game:
Used game engine: Unity versions 5.6.7f1.
beautiful graphics (only overdone with Bloom Effect, I will fix it in the future)
new props.
new sounds.
sounds walking on different surfaces.
Now you do not need to press E, you just need to go and that's it.

Minuses:
The game has bugs
menu is bullshit.
too small.

Manual:
WASD or arrows - walk
Left Shift - Running.
Esc pause.

System Requirements: Windows 7,8,81,10 32 and 64 bit (On Windows XP and Vista you will not play because it hangs problems with graphics, and crashes!) RAM 2 GB, 4 GB recommended 2 GB video memory (with DX11 support) 4 core processor. Memory on HDD or SSD - 300 MB   Good game...  Programs used: Unity Pro 5.6.7f1, Notepad ++ Blender, Audacity,  Elapsed time: 5 months, 4 days
